duck: One-hot - In digital circuits, one-hot refers to a group of bits among which the legal combinations of values are only those with a single high bit and all the others low.
Being the only one of its kind: the unique existing example of Donne's handwriting.
In mathematics and logic, the phrase "there is one and only one" is used to indicate that exactly one object with a certain property exists.

wiki.text:
In mathematics and logic, the phrase "there is 'one and only one'" is used to
indicate that exactly one object with a certain property exists. In mathematical
logic, this sort of quantification is known as 'uniqueness quantification' or
'unique existential quantification'.

Uniqueness quantification is often denoted with the symbols "∃!" or
∃<sub>=1</sub>". For example, the formal statement
: <math>\exists! n \in \mathbb{N}\,(n - 2 = 4)</math>
may be read aloud as "there is exactly one natural number n such that n - 2 =
4".
wiki.title: Uniqueness%20quantification
headings: Reduction to ordinary existential and universal quantification
